activities:
We provide an analytics system for software applications, on the web, mobile devices, and servers. Our customers use it to collect data about how their software is being used by their end-users so that they can fix problems and build better software. We collect, process and store this data in order to provide this service.

We also collect data about how our customers use Rollbar so that we can improve the service itself.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data submitted to Rollbar online through the services. Our organization does not manually process any personal data.
